title: Stadionul Municipal (Salonta)
text:
Stadionul Municipal is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Salonta">Salonta</a>, <a href="Romania">Romania</a>. It is mostly used for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="CSM%20Olimpia%20Salonta">Olimpia Salonta</a>. The stadium holds about 1,200 people.
A full-size <a href="artificial%20turf">artificial turf</a> pitch was created at the facility in 2006.
